Meeting at FrOSCon 2017

21 Jul 2017

We’re planning to have a restic meeting at this year’s FrOSCon, which takes place on 19 and 20 August 2017 in Sankt Augustin near Bonn/Cologne in Germany. The entry is free! In order to organize this, please add a “+1” reaction to the GitHub issue #1110. We’re looking forward to meeting you!
